Welcome to Ka-Boost’s documentation!¶

Welcome to the manual for the Ka-Boost library. This will serve as the main documentation for all of the included Ka-Boost libraries, and provide documentation on the usage of rossum, ktransw, and TP+. There are also sections on meta pre-processor macros, as well as useful tips and tricks for programming in FANUC Karel.

Ka-Boost¶

This is repository of a collection of FANUC Karel libraries. Each package is formatted to work with the karel package manager rossum, and compiler wrapper ktransw.

install¶

git clone https://github.com/kobbled/Ka-Boost --recurse-submodules
